name: WinJournal Journal File
summary: Learn about .WJF files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: WJF files can be saved with password protection and 256-bit AES encryption, which helps protect private journaling information.
NOTE: Mariner software no longer develops WinJournal.

description: Digital journal created by WinJournal, a personal journaling and blogging application; contains a collection of journal entries, including the title, date, and written text for each entry; may also include images as well as audio and video content; used for storing and organizing personal thoughts in a single location.
